channel.title: Shell accounts
channel.description: Hello, I have some questions about these shell accounts. I would like to make some on my home computer so I can ssh and tunnel to them remotely. I have one from http://jaguar.garofil.be/ but it stopped me from tunneling recently. Can anyone help? Thanks Justis EDIT: Never mind, I think i found it. http://lifehacker.com/software/home-server/geek-to-live--set-up-a-personal-home-ssh-server-205090.php

item.title: Shell accounts
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hello, I have some questions about these shell accounts. I would like to make some on my home computer so I can ssh and tunnel to them remotely. I have one from http://jaguar.garofil.be/ but it stopped me from tunneling recently. Can anyone help?
Thanks
Justis
EDIT: Never mind, I think i found it.
http://lifehacker.com/software/home-server/geek-to-live--set-up-a-personal-home-ssh-server-205090.php

Read full topic
